definition: Only an outstanding talent can recognize current trends (idiom). A wise man submits to circumstances.
pinyin: shi2 shi2 wu4 zhe3 wei4 jun4 jie2

sentences.english: My name is Liujunjie. She is Heyi. We are good friends.
sentences.chinese: 我是何怡，他是我的好朋友刘俊杰。

sentences.english: I'm a fan of JJ Lam.
You are my second idol, JJ you know?
sentences.chinese: 你是我第二个偶像，林俊杰你知道吗？

sentences.english: Those who let themselves be guided by the current course of events are real heroes.
Junjie caught horse standing in line to buy tickets in the supermarket of the PP.
sentences.chinese: 俊杰在超市里撞见在排队买马票的PP。

sentences.english: You want to marry someone called Masumi.
sentences.chinese: 你会想嫁给一个名字叫做秋俊杰的。

sentences.english: Lam began to gain momentum for a game. It's "Heaven II"this time.
sentences.chinese: 俊杰也开始为游戏造势了，这次是《天堂II》。

sentences.english: They tried to dress him up as a "national hero".
sentences.chinese: 他们想把他化装一个”民族俊杰”。

sentences.english: He is born for music and his name is JJ Lin.
sentences.chinese: 他出生于音乐世家，他的名字叫林俊杰。

sentences.english: TO My Dear JJ LIN . Happy Birthday .
The real hero of the match was our goalkeeper.
sentences.chinese: 这次竞赛中真正的俊杰是替考的守门员。

sentences.english: If we take finding opportunity as foresight, then grasping opportunity is a person of outstanding talent.
sentences.chinese: 如果说发现机遇是识时务，而把握好机遇方为俊杰。

sentences.english: Singaporean singer JJ Lin was the first power icon, having been appointed last month.
sentences.chinese: 新加坡歌手林俊杰是上个月请来的第一位代言人。

sentences.english: Jun-jie hao to worry about the ability of the new fourth army, he is waiting for hydrostatic county of good news.
sentences.chinese: 郝俊杰担心新四军的能力，他在等静水县的好消息。

sentences.english: MusicHi everyone. This is me and Jack's instrumental cover of JJ Lin's She Says.
sentences.chinese: 大家好，这个是我和Jack演奏的林俊杰的她说。

definition: outstanding talent/wise and able person/illustrious individual
well versed in letters and military technology (idiom); fine scholar and soldier/master of pen and sword
worthy or virtuous person/honorific used for a person of the same or a younger generation
famous scholar/worthy/celebrity, esp. distinguished literary person having no official post
the present age/in office/the current office holder
the young will be redoubtable in the years to come (idiom)/the younger generations will surpass us in time

Yan, a vassal state of Zhou in modern Hebei and Liaoning/north Hebei/the four Yan kingdoms of the Sixteen Kingdoms, namely: Former Yan 前燕 (337-370), Later Yan 後燕|后燕 (384-409), Southern Yan 南燕 (398-410), Northern Yan 北燕 (409-436)/surname Yan
